fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, choose to plant an LED sensor in front of one player's house. If the chosen player is visited, this sensor lights up in one of five colours depending on the current defense of the role that visited them.

fields.name: Green:
fields.value:
No Defense
Blue: Basic Defense
Purple: Powerful Defense
Orange: Invincible
Red: Overprotective

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your lights may also detect visits to the direct neighbours of your target, but the lights will only shine White if they are visited, not specifying the defense of their visitor. This effect is overridden by your main target being visited.
- Visits count as Astral.
